title: Starry Night
description: A famous painting depicting a swirling night sky over a small town

title: The Scream
medium: Oil tempera pastel and crayon on cardboard
description: Iconic expressionist painting showing an agonized figure against a tumultuous sky

title: Girl with a Pearl Earring
description: Portrait of a girl wearing an exotic dress and a large pearl earring

title: The Persistence of Memory
description: Surrealist painting featuring melting clocks in a dreamlike landscape

title: American Gothic
description: Portrait of a farmer and his daughter standing before a house in the Carpenter Gothic style

title: The Birth of Venus
description: Depicts the goddess Venus emerging from the sea as a fully grown woman

title: Guernica
description: Anti-war painting depicting the bombing of Guernica during the Spanish Civil War

title: The Kiss
medium: Oil and gold leaf on canvas
description: Depicts a couple embracing in an intimate moment covered in elaborate robes

title: The Night Watch
description: Large group portrait of a city guard company

title: Mona Lisa
description: Portrait painting of Lisa Gherardini known for her enigmatic smile
